overview:
Mario Canamar is a digital marketing expert with about 10 years of experience in new media and the internet. A graduated psychologist with a specialization in marketing, he promotes professional digital marketing as the best approach, he understands the needs of small businesses and likes helping them until they reach a healthy growth. Using many different tools to better understand web users and their needs, he has gathered a wealth of knowledge that can help any business, from the small to major corporations.

Mario is President of Cualli Ohtli Digital Marketing, a digital marketing firm based in Toronto, Canada. He specializes in helping small to medium sized businesses achieve their marketing goals through the use of internet applications and research based marketing techniques. Always on the edge of technology, he helps businesses make sense of the internet and the new marketing world.

degrees.subject: Psychology
degrees.institution: Centro de Estudios Universitarios de Monterrey

web_presences.title: The Marketing Stuff - a blog about marketing
